reviews.review_msg: If you talk to him, he's actually a good guy, but the marking on these tests was brutal, I think the class actually got dumber as a result of taking 387 with him. Yikes. I went for extra help and he hurled insults at me. Nice. How about an answer key? How about coordinating tutorials with the classwork? ...Avoid this excercise in humility
her notes r pretty messy.  and have to print out notes and suddenly add in something but wont tell you until lecture starts.  midterms r fairly okie, but assignments are pretty hard!!!
Her teaching style is quite scattered. SHES ALL OVER THE PLACE!!!!

His assignments are very time-consuming. It takes two to three days to complete it. And his curve will scare you to death. The grade cut off is 50 for a C- 74 for a C  82.5 for a C+ and 87 for a B-. The quizzes are easy tho but the assignments are not.
WORST PROF IN ECONOMICS HISTORY! STOP ENROLLING IN HIS CLASSES SO WE CAN GET A NEW, BETTER PROF!
Terrible prof. Bullies students, doesn't communicate well, writes confusing exams.
This guy SUCK..don't know why he is still teaching! His english is full of accents and always picking on people by asking questions but no one could really understand what his question!

This guy is a jerk. Really frustrating to talk to a guy with a very high ego (always thinks the students are wrong). Pointless lectures, horrible slides, disgusting attitude, no teaching ability and a ridiculously hard marker. Stay home and memorize the notes and everything will be fine. Take another prof if possible.
worst prof I've ever had in SFU! very hard exams! Inconsistent format for his practice exams, midterms, and final! It will surpirce you BADDDDDD!
